title: Israel and Hamas Battle Around Gaza as Netanyahu Warns of ‘Long’ War
description: A senior Israeli defense official said that an early estimate showed about 700 Israelis were believed to be dead, and Gaza officials said more than 400 Palestinians have been killed.

title: Tropical Storm Lidia Expected to Become a Hurricane Before Hitting Mexico
description: The storm, which is expected to strengthen to a hurricane by Tuesday, could bring heavy rains leading to mudslides, forecasters said.

title: Trump’s Claim that U.S. Taxpayer Money Funded Hamas Attacks Is False
description: The claim centers on Iranian oil profits released from banks in South Korea.

title: After Hamas Attack, U.S. to Send Weapons and Warships to Support Israel
description: The moves were designed by the Biden administration to reassure Israelis of the United States’ commitment, despite months of tension between Mr. Biden and Israel’s prime minister.

title: Videos Capture Two Partygoers Being Kidnapped by Militants at Music Festival
description: Videos verified by The New York Times show the abduction of a woman at a music festival in Israel near the Gaza border.

title: Monday Briefing: Israel’s Leader Warns of a Long War
description: Plus bucking beauty standards in China.

title: Biden Says Military Assistance Is on Its Way to Israel
description: Israel has asked for “additional assistance,” according to Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken.

title: McCarthy Allies Criticize Far Right for Leaderless House as Israel Is Attacked
description: Several Republicans fumed at the rebels in their ranks for rendering Congress impotent at a time when legislation and additional funding could be needed to help Israel.

title: Bavarian Election Results Signal Trouble for Scholz’s Government
description: The election served as a midterm report card for Chancellor Olaf Scholz, and the grades were not good.

title: Graphic Images of Violence Flood Social Media Amid Israel-Gaza Conflict
description: There is a long history of misinformation being shared among Israeli and Palestinian groups, with false claims and conspiracy theories rising during moments of heightened violence in the region.

title: Entire Villages Razed as Death Toll Soars From Quakes in Afghanistan
description: Local officials reported 813 confirmed deaths, though the toll was expected to rise. Homes were reduced to rubble, and hospitals are overwhelmed.

title: Israel’s Defense Failures May Change Strategy Toward Hamas and Gaza
description: The broad attack by Palestinian militants, which Hamas viewed as mostly successful, revealed some significant failures.

title: Pakistan Demands Deportations of Over Million Afghans
description: The Pakistani authorities announced plans to expel more than one million Afghans living illegally in Pakistan, a sign of increasing hostility between the Pakistani government and Taliban authorities.

title: The Big Nobel Prize Winners Were Short and Fast
description: The awards for physics and chemistry were a reminder that the most important processes in nature unfold on a scale divorced from everyday human affairs.

title: Poland’s Ruling Party Uses Germany as Boogeyman as Tough Election Looms
description: Poland’s Law and Justice party is using Germany as a punching bag to rally its base for the election on Oct. 15, a tactic driven by the country’s de facto leader, Jaroslaw Kaczynski.

title: Rape, Race and a Decades-Old Lie That Still Wounds
description: Farid El Haïry spent most of his adult life as a convicted rapist. Then his accuser changed her story.

title: Israeli Witness Recounts How Militants Invaded His Village
description: A resident of a town taken by Hamas militants describes hearing attackers outside his window, running and shooting, as they tried to find people to take hostage.

title: A Quick Look at Hamas
description: The Islamist militant group that controls Gaza has taken its attacks on Israel to a new level, building on decades of hostilities.

title: Who Is Hamas, The Military Wing in the Gaza Strip?
description: The Islamist militant group that controls Gaza has taken its attacks on Israel to a new level, building on decades of hostilities.

title: Israel-Gaza Conflict: Israel Warns of Long War as It Moves to Drive Out Militants
description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the first stage of the war was nearly over and the military would turn to “offensive” operations. Hamas continued to fire rockets at Israel more than 24 hours after its surprise attack started.

title: Timeline of Deadly Attacks in Israel and Response in Gaza
description: The first air raid sirens went off at sunrise as Hamas launched an attack by land, sea and air. Israel declared a state of war and has destroyed buildings in Gaza.
